overview:
Nicholas Clark is the Software Architect of DoubleDutch, the first and only provider of cloud-based geosocial mobile applications for the enterprise.

Prior to DoubleDutch, Nicholas was a Senior Development Engineer at Microsoft, working on Internet Explorer for 5 years, and Bing Mobile for 1 year. While at Microsoft, Nicholas founded and operated MobileSrc, a mobile development shop. MobileSrc pioneered a new form of location-based gaming for which a patent has been granted.

Nicholas attended Cornell University and received a BS in Electrical and Computer Engineering with a focus in Computer Architecture and Digital Signal Processing.
